lore: {"text":"The Powder Ghast is a mob that spawns,","color":"gray"}
{"text":"randomly in Dwarven Mines. It's not a part of the regular cycle,","color":"gray"}
{"text":"and instead is a random occurrence. The Powder Ghast can spawn","color":"gray"}
{"text":"in one of the following locations: Divan's Gateway,","color":"gray"}
{"text":"The Powder Ghast is immune to melee damage. Players will receive,","color":"gray"}
{"text":"60 Mithril Powder for every hit that lands on its hitbox.","color":"gray"}
